title: AI data centres new power guzzlers: Trump eyes deal with tech giants to ease water, electricity strain
description: The Trump administration is seeking a pact with Big Tech to curb the surging energy and water demands of artificial intelligence data centres amid mounting public and environmental concerns.
content: Artificial intelligence may be driving the next industrial revolution, but it’s also creating a new kind of energy crisis. The US administration is pursuing a voluntary agreement with major technology companies to ensure the growing fleet of AI data ... [3601 chars]

title: The Economic Times joins India AI Impact Summit 2026 as official media partner
description: As the official media partner of the India AI Impact Summit 2026 in New Delhi, we will deliver expansive, high-impact coverage across every critical moment of the event. From keynote addresses and strategic policy conversations to breakthrough research, global impact challenges and start-up showcases, our reporting will capture the ideas, partnerships and innovations shaping the next phase of artificial intelligence.

title: China’s Top Chipmaker Warns Rushed AI Capacity Could Sit Idle
description: China’s top chipmaker has warned that breakaway spending on artificial intelligence chips is bringing forward years of future demand, raising the risk that some data centers could sit idle.

title: India ramps up AI rules for social media platforms
description: India tightened rules regulating artificial intelligence on Feb 10, requiring social media platforms to clearly label AI content and comply with takedown requests by authorities within three hours.
content:
